comment._content: Actually, it does look like it has the date recorded - 10/22/12.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: the trial: Thank you!  It does look like 10/22/12 is the correct date. Image appears related to Roosevelt's trip by train from Chicago to Oyster Bay, Long Island after an assassination attempt.  (Washington Post article, Oct. 22, 1912). We'll fix the information in the source data and reload the description.
